etymology.description: 亻(亻) (rén, "person") + 由(由) (yóu, "cause") = combining person and cause -> form related to human action, urging -> to urge to eat
etymology.interpretation: The character 侑(yòu) combines the 'person' radical亻to imply an action associated with people, and 由(yóu) as the phonetic component. This reflects an action of prompting or urging someone, specifically in a dining scenario, to encourage them to eat.
